name: Dungeon Seeker
description:
This is a simple, short platform game created as part of a small college project. Don't expect anything out of the basics of any platformer, but play the game and provide us with some feedback on top of what's done if possible, as we appreciate it a lot.

The game is composed of a menu, tutorial level and a level 1, and is moderately difficult for people that are not used to platforming games, however it should take you about a minute to complete it regardless.

It is recommended to play the game in full screen.

All music by:

Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
